allow:
Bash(git commit --allow-empty -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Trigger Vercel redeployment - Story 2.2 complete

All TypeScript errors resolved in commits:
- 668f77b: Data loading integration
- 7db0e01: CvDDataPoint import fix
- acdf89b: Type-only import fixes

Forcing new deployment to pick up latest fixes.

)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
CRITICAL FIX: Update CvDDataPoint type definition for Story 2.2

ISSUE:
Vercel builds failing with "Property 'coveragePercent' does not exist on type 'CvDDataPoint'"
because the updated type definition was never committed!

OLD FIELDS (pre-Story 2.2):
- coverage
- demand
- surplus
- utilizationPercent

NEW FIELDS (Story 2.2):
- forecastedCalls
- scheduledAgents
- coveragePercent
- metadata { skillsAvailable, peakHour }

This change aligns the type definition with the actual CvD data structure
used by the coverage calculator and demo data.

IMPACT:
- Fixes all TypeScript compilation errors in validateDemoDataIntegration.test.ts
- Enables Vercel deployment to succeed
- Aligns type system with Story 2.2 implementation

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
